administrativeStatus.description: Indicator for access to an item.

description.description: The description of the information object

validFrom.description: The date on which the information object is effective or valid. Set this date only once (constant). The same date for all versions of this information object.

version.description: Formal versioning of the information object. The version designator of the information object assigned by the owner agency. "major.minor.patch", e.g. "1.12.5".

versionValidFrom.description: The date on which the current version of the infomation object is effective or valid.

versionRationale.description: The reason for making this version of the information object.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date on which the object was last updated.

createdDate.description: The date on which the information object was created

name.description: A term which designates a concept, in this case an information object. The identifying name will be the preferred designation. There will be many terms to designate the same information object, such as synonyms and terms in other languages.

validUntil.description: The date on which the information object is no longer effective or valid.

id.description: The global unique identifier (GUID) of the information object assigned by the owner agency.

shortName.description: A short technical name. (Avoid special characters not supported as variable names in common programming languages).

administrativeDetails.description: Administrative details (e.g. default language, documentation, localID, ...).

MeasurementType.displayName: The Measurement Type defines the type of a measure e.g. mass or currency. The Measurement Type groups all Measurement Units, which can be converted into each other. A Measurement Type can have a standard Measurement Unit, which can be used for conversion between different Measurement Units.
MeasurementType.description: The Measurement Type defines the type of a measure e.g. mass or currency. The Measurement Type groups all Measurement Units, which can be converted into each other. A Measurement Type can have a standard Measurement Unit, which can be used for conversion between different Measurement Units.
